11122.content:
This past week had been the best week that Alex has ever lived. For the past seven days, Alex has almost been living by the five weight gain tips listed on his favorite site.

1. The only food Alex had been eating is sweets, burgers, and other fried food. He mostly ate sweets though. Sweets were readily available since Alex's mom was a very gifted baker who made her treats with both quality and quantity in mind. Alex's mom also only felt comfortable with a full pantry and fridge; even if all the contents are missing, she wouldn't think anything of it and get started on refilling them. When Alex's mom found out that he was eating her sweets, she was delighted. In the past, neither of her children were big on sweets. Even though Alex's sister, Carly, was a very chubby girl, she hardly ate any of her mom's works. Knowing that at least one of her children appreciated her sweets made her very pleased. She even went out of her way to make even more treats than she usually does, knowing Alex would eat all of them. Alex's mom was also hoping that her skinny boy will now start to put a bit of meat on his bones, finally putting her fears at rest of having an anorexic child. Because of this, she made Alex extra large meals with hearty food such as Mac and Cheese, fried chicken, and sometimes even dessert for a meal. She did not know of his plot, however. To supplement his primarily dessert and fried food diet, Alex walked to the Micky D's that was close to his apartment. He ordered off the dollar menu, usually bought five or six items, and ate it right at the place. Almost every time he went, Alex saw someone staring at him with either disgust, curiosity, or sometimes joy/humor.

2. When Alex ate, boy did he eat. When he ate desserts at home, he almost always brought them to his room, where he would close the door, occasionally strip down to his undies, and pig out; leaving his room with both a bloated belly, and a hunger for more treats which his mother kindly and readily provided. Alex was eating almost 24/7, whether while on the computer, in class, watching TV, or socializing, he was always found with food in his hand.

3. Alex almost never left the house. To pass the time, he either played on his computer or his [insert your console of choice here]. He was also very active on Cubs2chubs, trying to earn a reputation for himself so the likelihood of winning a prize would increase. Because a few of his friends were the sporty type, instead of them doing a physical activity together outdoors, Alex invited them inside to eat treats instead.

4. On the weekdays, Alex would stay up until 2:00 in the morning. On the weekends he would stay up until 5:00. He spent most of that time awake either eating, or playing [insert your console of choice here]. Alex also made sure to spend a good portion of the day asleep.

5. Before he discovered Cubs2chubs, Alex spent his time with friends outside, playing sports. Now, whenever Alex had friends over, they either ate at McDonalds, they ate homemade desserts, or sometimes both the former and latter. When Alex had friends over, his mom was always happy to serve them her desserts. Alex usually had his mother take out a very large amounts of sweets for his friends, even if he only has one friend over; Alex encouraged them to eat all the desserts and their plates were always cleaned. His mom's desserts were famous for being absolutely delectable, the the boys weren't complaining when they were served piles upon piles of the best desserts in town rather than getting sweaty out in the baking sun. By the end of the week, none of Alex's friends were doing any exercising together. Instead, they were all eating cakes, pies, brownies, cookies, and much more. This did have an effect on some of the boys that came frequently. CJ, Alex's best friend for example, (who Carly has a crush on) used to be a skinny lad, until he started eating with Alex. Now, he has a much bigger belly that slightly pokes out of his shirt. Although some of Alex's friends have definitely started to get pudgy, they continued eating the desserts that Alex's mom presented them. In fact, some of them have started eating more, even when they were away from Alex.


It was Saturday evening and some of Alex's friends left his apartment, leaving Alex alone. Alex walked over to his bathroom scale. It read:

At 5:30 PM he shook his brother awake.

"Wake up! It's supper!"

"Ugh... wow I really slept a long time. What's for eats?"

"Well should I cook something... or howabout the buffet on Main?"

"I don't trust your cooking," Alec giggled, "I like the buffet idea."

"Me two, it's easier for me. Mom and dad left some money anyways."
13111211.title: Alec is bloated

131112111.content:
Jake grabbed the money his parents left from the counter and put it in his wallet then stuffed his wallet into his jeans' pocket. He had some trouble as there seemed to be less room in his pockets these days, as his now chunkier waist, thighs and bubble but filled out his dark blue circa's more and more. Jake could see Alec was having trouble buttoning his jeans, and couldn't help but giggle a little.

"Having a little trouble, tubby?" Jake couldn't help making a comment.

"Shut up! I can do it, see" Alec sucked in his gut as much as he could and finally got the jeans to close, "besides you're a little chubby yourself," he patted his older brother's soft mid-section.

"Being bigger is great. It even got me a girl's number this morning," Jake showed Alec a small piece of paper.

"Really? Cool. Most girls my age don't like flab," Jake said,"Aahh these jeans are cutting off my circulation."

"You can borrow a pair of mine if you like," Jake suggested, "I think there's a pair from when I was around your age in the closet in my room."

"Okay! Yeah these are realllly uncomfortable," Alec unbuttoned them and let out a sigh of relief. He raced upstairs, but quickly slowed down due to the weight of his bloated stomach, "I'll be down in a sec!"

Alec went into his room and slipped off his jeans then threw them in the laundry. He took his shirt off and examined himself in the mirror. His face looked a little rounder, but he didn't have a double chin just yet. His pecs were softer and it looked like he was just starting to grow moobs. His belly, due to the bloat, stuck out past the waistband of his boxers, which were tight around his thighs. His legs, once bony and thin, now had a bit of meat around them. Maybe it was a growth spurt?

He put on a better shirt then went into the next room, which was his brothers bedroom. Since Jake moved out it was still the same as he left it, except the bed was replaced by a mattress on the floor and Jake's computer was moved to his dorm. Alec looked in the closet and saw some old folded jeans on the bottom, that were still in pretty good condition. Alec's normal jean size was 27, but these were 31s. They were baggy, and Alec had to pull them up so they would stay around his waist. He wore a pair of Jake's boxers, because they were more comfortable then his now-tighter ones. He also took a belt from the top shelf which he knew Jake couldn't wear anymore. Alec felt a little strange wearing Jake's clothes from the waist down but it was better then his tight jeans.
131112111.title: Alec borrows some clothing

1311121111.content:
When he first got in the car, Alec felt stuffed but by the time Jake pulled into a parking space at the buffet Alec felt as if he hadn't eaten in days. Jake knew he would stuff his face but tonight he wanted to test the limits of his little brother. The two boys were seated in a booth right next to the buffet tables.

"Ready for the food squirt?" Jake teased.

"Yes I am! I'm actually soo hungry" Alec said.

The two got up and walked towards the buffet. Jake pushed Alec as close as possible to the food and put a plate between his hands.

"It's all-you-can-eat, so don't be shy," Jake said while scooping heaps of food on his plate, "take as much as you like!"

Alec looked at the food and filled it up with his usual amount, but he was amazed at how much his brother could fit on one dish. He then decided to follow his brothers example-when his brother would put something on his plate he would put twice as much. He litterally had a pile of delicious and fattening food on his plate, a true skyscraper of calories.

"Whoa, are you sure you're gonna eat all of that?" Alec's older brother asked him.

"Yeah well I'm just really hungry!" Alec said staring down at his plate as he set it on the table.

"Alrighty well don't forget to save room for desert!" Jake said with a smile on his face.

"I will," Alec responded as he picked his first forkful. He placed the fork into his mouth. His tastebuds exploded, the food was so delicious. He started eating faster and faster and pretty soon he was practically inhaling his food!

"Up for another plate?" Jake encouraged.

"Hell yea!"

Once again, Jake loaded his plate high with food. And once again, everything Jake took, Alec made a mental note to take twice as much. And once again as history repeats itself, the food dissapeared very quickly. Because the boys were sitting in a booth where nobody could really see them, they could eat as fast as they wanted to without anybody noticing. It all went by so fast, and before Alec knew it he was done and Jake asked him once again if he wanted to go with him to get another plate. Jake had realized Alec was taking twice as much as him so he upped his portions substantially, and yet Alec still took twice as much. Jake could see Alec was getting a little nervous about the sheer amount of food he was taking, but Alec knew he had to out-eat his brother.

Jake and Alec began shovelling forkfulls of food in their mouths, and by this time both knew it was litterally a competition. Halfway through, Alec felt stuffed, as in stuffed to the max. 'If I eat one more bite I'll explode' Alex thought. Nevertheless, he chugged his glass of 7-up, loosened his brother's belt he was wearing a notch and resumed his pace if not then he even faster then before. Jake meanwhile was beggining to feel full and slow down. His jeans were digging into his expanding waistline, and his shirt straining against a growing belly.

Somehow, Jake managed to finish and announced that this would be his final plate. In a triumph of victory, Alec finished his plate and got another, stacked just as high. When he sat down he felt a tug at his waist and his belt came undone. He re-did the belt but two holes looser then it had been before. And then Alec got another plate, and after finally eating 5 plates stacked high with food, Alec was STUFFED.


Just then Jake stood up and said: "..."
1311121111.title: Off to the Buffet!!

choices: Alex agrees, Dairy Queen it is
Alec thinks they should stay at the buffet
13111211111.content:
Just then, Jake stood up and said "let's get desert!"

"Great idea," Alec said, pretending he still had some room to spare in his stomach, "some of the stuff at the desert bar looked really good."

"I have a better idea, how about we get desert at Dairy Queen instead?" Jake suggested, "I still have some money left over."

"Well..."
13111211111.title: "Let's get desert"

131112111111.content:
"Well... yeah i love DQ" Alec stood up too. Jake could really see the damage one night at the buffet had done to Alec; his belly was really sticking out and pushing against his shirt. Jake paid the bill and the two walked out to Jake's car and they must've really been a sight!

Jake's bloated belly strained against his now tighter white shirt, and half an inch of skin showing at the bottom. Not to mention two love handles that didn't really help the situation. Jake's jeans were stretched very tightly around his meaty, wider thighs and thick legs. His bubble but filled out his jeans to the limit. His big musclular arms now had an extra layer of flesh around them. His face was full and a double chin was beggining to move in.

Alec's stomach was painfully bloated as well. It was as hard as a drum and he could hear the intense amount of food he just ate was sloshing around in his belly. His brother's jeans were loose on him but he was defininently fitting them more then before the buffet.

The car drove up to the drive thru speaker at DQ and Jake ordered...
131112111111.title: DQ

choices: Later that night... Alec is hungry
1311121111111.content:
DQ had run out of blizzards, so Jake ordered the mini-cakes (just as fattening). Alec loved the feeling of being full and eating untill his limits, so he devours his oreo cake in just 1 minute. Big mistake. After that he was soo full, he felt like he was going to pass out right there in the car. But luckily he survived the drive home.

For the rest of the evening Jake was talking on his cell. Alec meanwhile was asleep on the couch. He was feeling very exhausted from all of today's binging. Around 9 PM Alec woke up and asked Jake if he wanted to play Call of Duty. Jake loved to kick his little brother's ass at video games, so he happily agreed. And like usual, Jake did kick Alec's ass. They played for a few games then Jake said:

"I'm hungry, did you eat the leftover chocolate cake in the fridge?"

"No, I didn't touch it. It's all yours."

Jake went to the kitchen, which was right beside the living room and took out the cake and a knife to cut it with. There was about three quarters of it remaining. Alec saw the cake and he thought it looked really good; his stomach growled and almost asked Jake to cut him a piece when Jake asked him before he could get to it.

"Hey Alec you want a piece," Jake said, "there's lots here."

"No thanks," Alec thought about it in his head. He had already eaten too much that day and if he kept eating like this he could develop bad habits and get fat, "I'm full."

"Okay," Jake frowned and cut himself a small piece, "But you know where it is."

Geez, Alec thought, why is Jake trying to get me to eat that cake?

Around 11:30 Alec was feeling tired so he went to sleep in his bed. He was still wearing his brothers clothes, and he took them off in his room and left them on the floor. Alec slept with his boxers and he forgot he was wearing his brothers'.
1311121111111.title: Jake takes the cake

13111211111111.content:
Alec looked at his alarm clock. The red numbers said: "1:11". He guessed by now his parents were home, and probably in bed as well. Alec tryed to go to sleep, but a sharp pain in his stomach wouldn't let him. He stared at his bedroom ceiling. Then back at his alarm clock, now displaying 1:13. Maybe he should have a small midnight snack, to calm his hunger pain? A little snack never hurt anyone, right?

Alec opened the fridge. A blinding light send him a step back. He squinted his eyes and grabbed whatever food he saw. He brought his bounty into his room, closed the door and turned his lamp on to see what he got. Cake, chocolate bars, cookies (yes some people put those in the fridge to) and a two cans of pepsi.

Alec quietly unwrapped all the chocolate bars at once, then put them in a pile in his two hands. He took a deep breath and brought his hands up to his mouth, shoving as many bars as he could inside. With some difficulty he closed his mouth and chewed for about a minute, then swallowed some, then chewed some more, then swallowed some more, ect ect ect. Alec then quietly opened the first can of pepsi and chugged half of it. Moving on to the cookies. They were peanut butter, Alec's favourite kind, and also coincidentally one of the mose fattening kinds. He ate cookie after cookie without taking breaths between. After he ate all 20 or so of them, he chugged the remaining half of the first can of pepsi.

Crap, Alec thought, I don't have a fork to eat the cake. A fork would probably be futile as more then half of the chocolate cake was left. Alec took a handful of cake and shoveled it into his mouth. He wasn't exactly fond of eating with his hands, but by the time most of the cake was gone Alec was stuffing himself with handfuls of it at an alarming pace. After the cake was all gone, Alec chugged the second can of pepsi. He then hid the evidence (wrappers and cans) behind his bed. Finally the glutton could get a good night sleep, and so he did with a hand resting on his belly all night.
13111211111111.title: Alec takes the cake

choices: Alec stuffs himself at the buffet again
131112111111111.content:
The next morning Alec woke up starving. His big brother was already downstairs making breakfast.

"Eggs Squirt?" he asked.

Alec rubbed his eyes and yawned, then said, "sure, but where's mom and dad?"

"They're doing some shopping today, they won't be back until late again. How many eggs?"

"Oh okay."

"How many eggs?"

"How many are you having?"

"Six"

"Make it eight for me then."

Jake smiled at his little brother's words, laughing a little to himself. Alec went to the bathroom and took a shower before breakfast. When he was drying off and he looked in the mirrow, he noticed he'd gained a little bit on his belly.

When Alec sat down for breakfast with his brother, he sat down to a feast. Jake had make then eggs for him, rather than eight, and had made mountians of toast, sausage, and some bacon. "Sorry if the bacon tastes weird, I had to make it in the microwave so I didn't set the house on fire," Jake said jokingly.

Alec dug into his breakfast, quickly eating all his eggs and moving onto the sausage and bacon. Jake ate his food slowly, he knew today he was going to test and see just how much his little brother could really put down at once and he needed to have a moderately empty stomach for later.

Alec ate most of the food at the table, and he did it so fast he didn't even notice that Jake had hardly touched his. He walked away from the table a little later, stuffed and bloated again. He'd eaten 15 slices of toast, at least 20 pieces of sausage, and an uncountable amount of bacon. Not to mention the eggs his brother had stuffed with as much cheese that he could fit into the pan without spilling out.

A few hours later Jake came into the living room where Alec was resting and said, "it's about lunchtime, I was thinking that buffet from yesterday, how about you?"
131112111111111.title: The next morning...

choices: Alec falls into a food coma
1311121111111111.content:
Alec shifted on the couch. He was still a little stuffed from the feast of a breakfast that Jake had served up a little while earlier, and the thought of having to get up to eat was horrible. Still...Alec looked at his brother's jiggling, mesmerizing belly, and then down at the lone roll of fat that had begun to form around his own midsection.

"Ok," he replied heaving himself up, "Lemme borrow a pair of your pants though."

"Sounds good, there's a pair of sweatpants upstairs in my dresser. I'll go warm up the car.

Alec made his way upstairs and dug around in his brother's dresser until he found the pair. They were quite obviously bought after Jake's weight gain and were quite loose on Alec. Once he was satisfied they wouldn't fall down on him he rushed downstairs and jumped in the car.

"Pants fit ok?"

"Yup!" Alec replied grinning.

"Awesome, you can keep them. They're too small for me, now." Jake patted his belly, sending the fat accumulated their jiggling.

Alec marveled at his brother, imaging his gargantuan belly folded in two over the hem of the sweatpants.

"O-okay!" He patted his own belly, obviously he had some very big pants to fill.

At the restaurant, the two began heaping food on their plates. As he'd done before Alec took double what his brother piled on. He noticed though, that Jake seemed to be taking more than he had last night. It was almost as if Jake had eaten lightly last night to lure Alec into a false sense of security!

The two powered through five plates stacked high with food, barely pausing to take breathes between bites. Jake stood and went for sixths with Alec waddling behind. Once again Alec took twice the amount that Jake had.

"Sure you can finish that, squirt?"

"Of course." Despite his protests, Alec felt a little less sure. His belly was painfully distended, and the sweatpants that were once very loose on him were starting to fit. Still Alec began to shove food into his greedy mouth. Mashed potatoes, chicken wings, and mac and cheese all went down his gullet. The massive caloric intake was beginning to take a toll of Alec, and as he swallowed the last bit of food his eyes fluttered shut. He was ready to go home and take a long nap.

Jake however had other plans. He stood and returned to the table with two bowls over flowing with vanilla ice cream. On top of the ice cream, Jake had drizzled mounds of hot fudge, and marshmellow fluff. To top it off he'd thrown the proverbial cherry on top.

Alec moaned. His belly ached and was begging for him to stop, but this was war. With renewed gusto he dug into his bowl of ice cream.

When their bowls had been licked clean, the two brothers leaned back. Alec moaned again, feeling the contents if his belly slosh around painfully.

Jake eyed him wearily, afraid he'd exceeded his limits and was about to be sick all over the table, "You ok, squirt."

A massive belch escaped Alec's lips. "Ooooh" he groaned and rubbed his swollen belly, "Yeah. I'm cool-urp!" He belched again, and followed it up with a tinier burp, "Just-ooh- a little bloated."

"Cool." With more than a little trouble, the two hefted their-selves up and waddled to the cash register. Once again Jake found himself flirting with the female cashier. It was like all girls who worked in the food service industry liked their boys a little big!

Next to his brother Alec swayed. His belly was still painfully full, an he absentmindedly hand a hand over it as he stood. His shirt had been pushed up revealing an inch or two of milky white skin and his distended gut hung down an inch over the hem of his sweat pants. Alec yawned and burped again. That nap sounded pretty good right about now.

"Hey, before we head home, I've got to pick up a few things at the store," Jake said at to two got into the car.

"Ok, knock yourself out."

Alec closed his eyes, not noticing the devious grin on his brothers face.
1311121111111111.title: Alec stuffs himself at the buffet again

1311122.content: Alec started trying to lose some weight. Then his brother caught him tied him up and started force feeding him..
1311122.title: Alec wants to do sit ups

1312.content:
Alec couldn't help but stare at the size of his big brother's belly. He looks pudgier than he last saw the family when he went out for university and Alec couldn't take his mind out of it. Despite both his parent told him how proud he's growing up in weight gain, Alec feels a bit hesitant as whatever he feels isn't right for him to talk about, in case if he might hurt his feeling or himself in particular.

So he thought he wanted to leave Jake be fir a while and lay on his bed to have the last batch of potato chips before he heads to sleep till the next day.

The next morning came and the sun was shining over Alec through the window and that made him woke up terribly by a sheer moan he sometimes get when that sun have shown through his closed eyes. He got up to his sitting position when he had to come together to think about what it got through 24 hours or so ago. He only knew he was getting hungry and that he wanted to start by having breakfast when his mother yell by asking if Alec would be interested to?

"Alec, your brother's wondering if you would like to go with him to...
1312.title: hesitant to speak out

14.content: How did Peter Gain Weight by....?
14.title: Peter

choices: Agree to fatten his friend up and let himself be fattened up as well
Decline and think whether or not he wants to get fat in the first place
141.content:
Peter had always been fascinated with the idea of gaining weight, but he never really acted upon those thoughts. He always caught himself gazing at the doughy round figures that rested upon the laps of his fellow guy friends whenever they sat down.

He had a pretty thin frame and an average appetite to say the least. He also never had anyone to share these thoughts with , except for his best friend Nathan who (of course) happened to share the same desires.

Nathan and Peter looked very similar , one could think they were twins at first glance! But unlike Peter, Nathan wanted him and his friend to pack on a "couple" pounds.

He shared his idea with Peter and explained his ideas of feeding and eating the month his parents would be out of town for work and how the two would spend their summer days.Peter wasn't so sure of his friends plan.

Should he ...
141.title: feeding

143.content:
Walking home from school one day, Peter noticed a shop he had never seen before, wedged between a book store and a music store. He frowned a little as he slowed down to look a little more closely at the strange store, he visited both shops either side of it quite a bit, but he had never seen it before. Despite feeling a little wary about the whole idea, Peter found himself walking inside, the door tinkling as he pushed it open. The shop was tiny, shrouded with purple cloths from every corner, the walls lined with shelves that were stacked with bottles of all shapes and sizes. Some were filled with milky blue liquids, others with bubbling green ones, Peter found himself staring until a sharp cough drew his attention away, and he jumped a little at seeing the middle aged woman sat behind the counter.

She was tall and thin, with light wrinkles about her violet eyes, with long black hair that fell down her back with a shimmer. "Only those who have a wish deep in their hearts can find this store," she commented, with the air of having to explain to many people why a store had appeared out of no-where, "It is my duty to help you grant those wishes." She smiled gently, and for a moment, she looked oddly pretty. She beckoned Peter closer to her with her finger, and oddly compelled to follow, Peter did.

"This potion" the witch began, setting down a purple potion on the counter in front of him, "Will grant any wish that you want to make." Peter found his mind swimming with the possibilities, his cheeks flushing a little as he looked down to his flat stomach. The witch smiled slowly as she tapped the side of the glass with her long fingernails, able to read his thoughts easily.

"You want to be fat," she commented with a frankness that made Peter flush further, "Then you could wish to be fat. Or you could wish to gain weight. I don't know how you want to do it. Or," her eyes sparkled as she leant in closer, "I could make you a special potion. You will gain and lose weight to your will. And no matter what size you are, people will have always seen you that way. But," she finally leant back, ".. do you have another idea?"
143.title: Magic Potion

1432.content:
"Can I take the special potion?" Peter asked a little nervously, the witch was an intimating figure, after all, "I'd like that." The witch smiled, and pushed the potion towards him, but kept her hand on it as her piercing violet eyes met his. Peter gazed at her back, shifting his weight from one foot to the other.

"When you drink this," the witch explained, "All you have to do is put your hand to your stomach, and wish what weight you want to be. If you're not sure, just say fatter, or chubbier, or thinner," she waved her hand, "It will all work. You can also specify body parts," she added, mischievously, "If you wanted to gain forty pounds in your stomach, just ask. The potion will know what you mean. It's clever like that." With that she moved her hand away, gesturing for Peter to drink. It tasted minty, creamy, and made his stomach tingle as he drank it down. Peter set the empty bottle down. He felt no different, he looked questioningly to the witch.

"Try it out," she suggested, resting her chin down against her folded hands, "Go on." Peter held his hand to his stomach, and wished...
1432.title: Take the Special Potion

choices: Gain enough weight to grow out of his school uniform
14321.content:
While he was eager to get big and round and fat, Peter knew that he had to take things slowly. He was testing out the effects of this supposedly magic potion after all, he reminded himself, his hand still to his stomach; fingers shaking slightly with nerves. He forced himself to keep his eyes open as he made his wish, looking down at himself expectantly.

'I wish I gained twenty pounds.' The moment the wish formed in his mind, Peter felt his stomach billowing out against his fingers. He looked down as the flesh rose slowly, warm and soft, until he had a rounded stomach on him that just stuck out over the waistband of his school trousers, which had become a little tight. Peter gasped as he moved his hand away, looking down in amazement at the stomach he now had on him. He bought his eyes slowly up to meet the witch's, she just smiled in response, her eyes notably focusing on his added girth.

"It suits you," she remarked with satisfaction, "Remember that everyone will have always seen you this size," she added, before giving a cackling, lilting laugh, "They'll always seen you as a bit chubby. They'll put that gut of yours down to food, not anything else." Peter felt over his newly added pounds with some amazement, a tingle going through him at that. The idea of having always been seen as being on the chunkier side appealed to him more than he would ever care to admit.

"Thank you," Peter bowed his head to the witch, "I mean it. This.. means a lot to me." She just focused that same smile on him, holding up her hand in a gesture for him to leave.

"Go. Explore the effects of this new gift of yours." Peter turned and left the shop, the door closing behind him with a light thud. He turned automatically, only to stare with wide eyes at the blank expanse of wall where the shop had been. He frowned, before touching his hand to his stomach, the pounds were still there. He had definitely been in there, Peter realised as he poked at the added fat to his lean frame, but there was no sign of the shop before his eyes. Forcing it to the back of his mind, Peter began walking home, his thoughts filling of what he could do with his new gift.
14321.title: To gain twenty pounds

choices: His mom feeds him up, always seeing him as being bigger
Peter decides to try and outrgrow his father's shirt.
143211.content:
On reaching his house, Peter was relieved to see that his parents had yet to come home. While he knew they would accept his larger size due to the spell, he wanted to have so more fun with it. He went up to his bedroom, throwing his school bag off to the side, and moved to stand in front of the floor length mirror that was fixed onto the side of his wardrobe. Peter turned this way and that to admire his plumper stomach, rubbing his hands down over the added fat in morbid fascination. Turning to stand so that he was stood sideways to the mirror, Peter kept his hands on his stomach, watching closely as he made his second wish.

'I wish I would get fat enough to grow out of these clothes.'

It was beyond fascinating to see his stomach push out slowly, it was as if he had taken a deep breath, before pushing his stomach out of his own accord. It billowed thicker and faster until it pressed even more tightly at the waistband of his pants. Peter swallowed as his shirt began to fill up with fat, the buttons struggling against the material, before starting to ping off one by one. His waist felt even tighter against the sturdy band of his pants, Peter grimaced a little, moving his hand to undo the button to relieve himself. Before he could, his pants ripped open at the front, the zipper shooting down to accommodate for his gut.

Peter gazed at the ball of flesh now sticking out from his stomach, grasping it between his hands, shivering as his fingers sunk into the flab. He had put on a good extra forty pounds, he reasoned dizzily as he let his stomach stick out over the broke waistband, his gut was huge and round, and very heavy against his frame. Peter realised with wide eyes that he had put on around 60lbs in the past hour, and every pound of it showed in his stomach.

Later that night..
143211.title: Gain enough weight to grow out of his school un...

1432112.content:
Peter snuck into his father's room, pulling a large shirt from the dirty clothes hamper. Today his dad was working around the house, and was wearing a shirt from at least 60 pounds ago. Peter also grabbed the scale from the bathroom and took both of the items to his room.
Once in the comfort of his room, he set the scale down and stepped on it. "211 pounds! I got sooo fat today!" He whispered. He took off his pajamas, leaving only his underwear on and threw on his dad's shirt. He looked at the mirror and placed his hand on his gut. "I wish I fit this shirt perfectly."
Peter was in bliss for the next couple minutes as the pounds added on to his frame. He eagerly stepped on the scale again which read "303." Peter was ecstatic! He had gained 90 pounds in a few minutes! Looking in the mirror, he notices that his gut is now over 130 pounds disproportionate to his body. He looks around himself and thinks "Should I make my butt bigger or my gut smaller?"
1432112.title: Peter decides to try and outrgrow his father

144.content:
Peter sighed as he walked out of the magic store. He stretched towards the sun, anticipating the new day. While he was a fan of magic and the occult, he still liked sunshine and that sort of thing. He moved a hand through his short black hair, and, waving to the woman who ran the store, went on his way out of the mall.

Peter was small for his age- sure, he was normal height, but at 104 lbs, he was quite thin. And he hated it. Sure, other people would have died for his metabolism, but really, Peter wasn't. He admired larger men, loved their large bellies, especially when they were spherical and firm to the touch. He also like muscles, which seemed a tad conflicting to others. Well, Peters self-proclaimed bisexuality seemed conflicting to some others, too, so that was probably just them.

Peter quietly opened the door to his house, and smiled as he heard his older brother, Derrick, snoring. He'd just gotten back form college, and Peter was sure he'd gained weight on his previously quite muscular body. But how much? Peter would see after he checked out what he'd bought at the mall- a small, silver ring with red jewels on it. Peter had bought the thing because it was said to....
144.title: The Ring?

1441.content:
Peter had bought the thing because it was said to grant wishes, and boy did he want that sort of power. But, first thing first, he went up to his room and locked the door, in case his brother woke up and decided he need something from him while he was wishing. If Derrick did that, he'd for sure want the ring, and he was a very forceful guy. But then again, that 20 year old sloth could sleep through anything. You take out the instructions for the ring that came from the store, and read them over quickly.

"Place on finger... Say wish out loud... Ring knows what you mean when vague...." you say, scanning the instructions for the important stuff. You put on the ring after the scan, and recap it once more for your mind. Basically, you've already done part one, and the other two parts were just wish and enjoy. 'Easy enough,' you think. So, for your first wish, you say "I wish there was a scale in my room." You look down to see a scale in front of you, in clear sight of the full view mirror your mom bought on a whim. You smile- it works! It really works!

You unzip your favorite hooded jacket (a black one dotted with small white stars, with soft white material inside), set it down on your bed, and look yourself over one more time before you wish your body away. You were wearing a blue T-Shirt that said "I got out of bed for this?" in orange letters that was quite baggy on you, and a pair of jeans that needed a belt to stay up. You decide that, for your first trick, you were going to remedy the bagginess. So, you say "I wish I would gain weight until I fit these clothes!"

155332221.content:
The yellow school bus came to a stop in front of Oakland High school with a huff. When the doors slid open, teenagers of all shapes, sizes, and age came streaming out of the vehicle, chattering with each other, their backpacks slung over their shoulders.

Mikey was the last to leave the bus, walking gingerly down the short stairway and stepping on the sidewalk. The bus' doors closed behind him almost immediately and it drove off, leaving the orange-haired, freckle-faced, chubby teen to stare longingly at it.

He turned his attention to the high school. For most this was just the beginning of another year, the beginning of the ninth grade, but for Mikey it was the end of his life.

Not that he was afraid of school or anything. In fact, back in his home town he was a bit of the bully in his grade. But it wasn't one of those typical "Give me your lunch money!" or "Do my homework, twerp!" kind of bully.

He was the type that made sure that nobody messed with him. But now...

Moving away from the town that you grew up in, away from your friends, away from things you know, could be hard on any young boy. It was no different for Mikey.

In this unknown town, which bordered of being almost a small city, which was built close to the shoreline, he had no friends and had to make new ones.

Times would be a little rough. He still upset with his step-father, or Robert, as he would like to call him, for making him, and his elder brother, Joseph, move here.

Though, he had to admit that it wasn't Robert's fault. Times in the economy, if Mikey knew correctly, were tough, and his father had to move to be closer to his job he found.

He worked as a supervisor at a port, making sure that the ships coming in were maintained and functioning properly. He had to do what he had to do to feed his family.

But still, Mikey missed his old home. He gave a sigh. There was no use sulking about something he could not change.

The school bell rang. Mikey realised that he was standing idle there like a bafoon this whole entire time while he was reflecting. He could not help but feel embarrassed.

Shaking his head, he quickly made some adjustments on his bacpack's straps, and, like a prisoner going to jail, he walked off towards the entrance of the school.
155332221.title: The new kid in town.

1553322211.content:
When Mikey arrived at his class, he saw that it was rowdy. Teenagers sat in disorganized groups, chatting loudly, and paper airplanes and erasers sailed through the air on a few occasions.

Mikey observed the classroom, the students completely oblivious of his arrival. Through his observation, he identified a few that stood out of the crowd: one was a nerdy kid, reading a book, sitting in front of the class; another was a well-built teen wearing mostly black clothing, a swarm of girls gathered around him; lastly was a group of teenagers that looked like they play football sitting in the back of the class.

Mikey, familiar with the way of bullies, made a mental note not to get close to the badboy and the junior jocks. But, as he was taking a seat next to the nerdy kid, who briefly acknowledge him, he saw in the corner eye all the jocks suddenly looking up in his direction, looking interested.

It made him feel uncomfortable, but he chose to ignore them. He saw one in the group, a rather thin and small jock, rise up in his seat, attempting to walk in his direction, but he unexpectedly sat down again.

Mikey wondered why he did this, but his question was answered when someone said: "Settle down class!"

He didn't even see his teacher coming in (Mikey guessed that he was too focused on the jocks in the back), but there he was, putting down his briefcase on his desk and throwing his brown blazer over a hook.

Mr.Wilson was the school's history teacher, a tall, overweight, old man that had a bald patch on his head. His attempt at authority was half-hearted, but it had immediate effect; teenagers went to their desks and the noise hushed.

Mr.Wilson looked at the class for a few seconds before he said: "Good morning class."

The class said good morning back to him.

"Now, class," he said, "We got a new student here today."

A few whispers went around the classroom. Mikey bit his lower lip. The most embarrassing thing to happen to a new kid on his first day at school was when the teacher called his name, asked him to stand, and tell the class something about himself. But Mikey was lucky today.

"But," said Mr.Wilson, "I'm not going to introduce him, because, quite frankly, I don't care."

Mikey raised his eyebrows, surprised but relieved at his teacher's uncaring behavior.

Mr.Wilson turned to his blackboard, saying: "Okay, class, take out your history books and turn to page one hundred."

While Mikey, and the class, did as he asked, the chubby teenager couldn't help but feel two eyes drilling into the back of his head.
1553322211.title: The first class of the day.

choices: He said that he would think about it.
15533222111.content:
The late morning sun found Mikey sitting on a bench, eating a sandwich and watching a few cheerleaders practicing. As he was enjoying his recess and the view, someone suddenly spoke.

"Hey, mind if I sit with you?"

Mikey looked up and saw the small, skinny jock from earlier. Now closer, Mikey had the opportunity to study him better: he had golden yellow hair, green eyes and a confident attitude.

Mikey didn't trust this. He looked around and spotted the jocks near the school's entrance, where they were sitting on their own benches, but they were minding their own business.

Mikey looked at the thin jock and shrugged, saying: "Sure."

The teenager took his seat and said: "You're the new kid, huh? Name's Jacob."

He held out his hand in greeting. Mikey had half the mind to tell him to beat it, especially after he called him "the new kid", but he guess that the aggressive, anti-social approach won't work here.

Instead, he took Jacob's hand in a firm shake, saying: "Sure, I guess I'm the new kid. Name's Mikey, by the way."

He wanted something from him, Mikey knew, for jocks don't just don't get interested in you for nothing, unless they were targeting you.

Mikey decided to rush this conversation, so he said, while rubbing his soft chin: "So, did they send you out to pick on me or something?"

"O, no, no!" said Jacob, shaking his head and grinning, "I just wanna talk, you know. Make friends with you, that's all."

Mikey raised an eyebrow. Yup, they definitely wanted something from him. "So, what do you want to talk about, friend?"

"Did you do any sport in your old school?" Jacob asked.

Mikey scratched his soft cheek, thinking. "Well," he began, "I did some swimming when I was twelve, but I left it after one summer. Why do you ask?"

Jacob shifted. "Well, you see, Andrew, one of our linemen on the team, moved away recently," he said, "And we're one sort now. We were kinda hoping, with your body structure-" he indicated with a sweep of his hand to Mikey's thick body "-that we could use you on the football team. I'm sure the coach would allow it, if Jim convinces him."

"So," Jacob finally finished, "What do you say?"

What did Mikey do?"
15533222111.title: The offer.

155332221111.content:
"I'll" said Mikey slowly, "think about it."

Jacob smiled and nodded, saying: "Take your time."

He left, walking up the small hill and towards the jocks sitting at the benches. Jacob stood there, talking to them. They casted glances towards Mikey. He watched them for a few moments, wondering if he should go over there, but his thoughts were interrupted when the school bell rang.

XxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxX

Mikey, with one strap of his backpack hanging over his shoulder, made his way slowly down the crowded hallway. He was heading to his last class for today, and he felt weary.

As his eyes glided across the white, clean wall, it fell on a bulletin board, and something caught his attention. Wrestling his way to the front, he stood in front of the bulletin board, searching for the thing he saw.

It was mostly littered with advertisements, but there were a few papers that offered dancing, music, cooking, and singing classes for those who wanted to join.

"Looking for something to join for the year?" a voice said next to Mikey.

He was a little startled, and he jerked to his right. The thing he saw made his eyes grow wide and his heart race. It was a beautiful girl, who had sandy blond hair that was tied up in a ponytail, chocolate brown eyes, and a warm smile on her face.

She was a head taller than Mikey, and he judged that she was a year older than him, and that she was in the senior grade.

Mikey struggled to find his voice, but when he did it came out as a stutter: "Y-yes."

He wasn't sure what he was doing, but he suddenly stretched out his hand, saying: "Umm, my name's Mikey. W-whats yours?"

She took his hand in a gentle shake, her hand feeling warm and soft. "Sarah," she said.

Sarah turned back to the bulletin board, repeating her question: "So, are you signing up for something?"

Mikey focused his attention back to the board, searching for the thing he saw. Now, where could it be? He swore he saw it!

"I-I don't know," he finally said, "What are you signing up for?"

She pointed one elegant finger to a paper that advertised a cooking contest. "I'm signing up for this," Sarah said.

"You can cook?" asked Mikey

Saran nodded, grinning proudly, showing her pearly white teeth. "Yes," she said, "I've got quite the talent! My mom learned me everything I know."

She suddenly looked about herself and said startled: "O, dear, I'm going to be late for my class. See ya around."

And with that said, she left. Mikey watched as she ran down the empty hallway and disappear around a corner. He gulped, pushing her face out of his mind, realizing that he was going to be late for his own class, too.

He quickly found the thing that he was looking for: a paper that advertised sumo wrestling classes. Mikey was surprised that a western school allowed such a sport. Yet again, with all the things that they were inviting into society today the world was getting pretty weird. Not that he was complaining, though.

He pulled it off the board, folded it, and placed it in his pocket. He quickly scurried off to his next class.
155332221111.title: Meeting Sarah.

choices: He decides to join the sumo wrestling instead.
1553322211111.content:
Mikey watched the trees and green grass zip past the window as the school bus made its way down the countryside. His mind was running through the memories he had gathered today: the offer to join the football team, the sumo wrestling classes, Sarah.

Sarah.

A image of her pretty face appeared in his mind, and he saw her warm smile, her sandy blond hair, her brown eyes, her pearly white teeth. He was so fixed with his daydream about her that he didn't even notice that the bus had come to a halt, and he had reached his destination.

Mikey was only brought back to reality when the bus driver, a sour old lady, shouted at him: "Kid! This is your stop. Get off!"

Mumbling a apology, Mikey grabbed his backpack and hurried out the bus. As the bus drove away, Mikey began to walk down the short stretch of dirt road that led to his house.

A few moments later he arrived at it. He stared at it for a while. Yup, it was going to take some time getting used to this place. It was a two-story wooden building, with a large tree in the back yard that stretched out for acres. It was situated a few miles out of town.

It was a far cry from the apartment he used to live in back in his own town. According to the people Robert, Mikey's father, bought it from, it ones belonged to a old farmer and his wife. When the farmer passed away, the widow sold the farm.

Mikey's family were no farmers, so, the land in the back was rarely used, but Mikey ones heard Robert talking of using it one day for something. As he ran up the front porch, Mikey saw that Robert was sitting outside on a rocking chair, looking at papers scattered all over the table.

"I'm back, sir," said Mikey.

Mikey rarely called Robert "dad", for he felt that it wasn't necessary, seeing that it wasn't his real father. Instead, he called him "sir" or simply "Robert" most of the time. Of course his stepfather tried numerous times to get him to call him dad, but Mikey refused until Robert gave up.

"O, your back," said Robert, sounding surprised. "I didn't see you. A bit busy with work. So, how was school."

Mikey shrugged. "It was fine, I guess," he said.

He rouse from the rocking chair, standing at his full height. Robert was a big man, in both height and weight. Weighing nearly 340 pounds, his round gut pushed against his ill-fitting tank shirt to, exposing his white flesh all the way to his navel. His hair was pitch black, unlike Mikey's orange hair, graying at the sides due to age.

"Wanna give your old man a hug?" he asked, trying to sound fatherly, holding out his arms.

Mikey considered the offer. His father looked quite soft and huggable. But he finally shook his head.

"No thanks," said Mikey

"O, okay," said Robert, sitting back on his rocking chair, which groaned under his weight.

Inside, Mikey heard the TV was on in the living room. When he checked, he saw that his brother, Joseph, was sitting on the sofa, watching a football match unfold.

Unlike Robert, Joseph looked much more related to Mikey, being his biological sibling, having orange hair, pale skin, and a few freckles on his face. But, what Mikey guessed they all shared in common with Robert, Joseph was big man, too, weighing at least, Mikey guessed, 305 pounds.

His days studying at college, a lazing a bit around at home, had softened his brother up a bit. Mikey saw that Joseph's ball belly was softening a bit, becoming more loose, and his thick arms and chest seemed more padded.

Mikey climbed the stairs and headed to his room. Ones there, he threw down his backpack and flopped on his back, sighing with relief. It has been a long day!

As he moved to get of his bed, he heard something crunch inside his pocket. Curious, Mikey reached inside and pulled out a piece of folded paper. Opening it he saw that it was the advertisement for the sumo wrestling classes.

Mikey stared at it for a while. He really wanted to make friends, and create a good reputation for himself, at Oakland High school. Mikey was curious about this sumo club and wanted to join, but he then remembered the offer Jacob made about a spot on the football team.

He didn't want to look like a loser by turning down a ones in a lifetime offer. If Mikey joined, and was successful, he would get majorly popular at school, impressing ladies everywhere. Hell, he could even win Sarah's heart by doing this.

"Oh, Sarah," Mikey sighed.

Yet again, if he joined the football team he could kiss his lazy lifestyle goodbye. From what he learned from his brother, Mike knew that football was no joke! It was grueling, where players sustained serious injuries. Mikey would also be drilled into shape, most likely also be put on a diet to mold him.

The sumo wrestling club sounded better to him. At least there he could eat as much as he wanted, for his weight was vital with pushing opponents out of the ring, right? If he took part in this sport he would still bulk up and build himself a reputation and gain friends at school, right?

What did Mikey choose?
1553322211111.title: Back home.
